name: Rocky Mountain Tea Tree Bar
description:
It is said of Tea Tree oil that it is one of “Nature’s finest antibiotics” and a “medicine cabinet in a bottle.”   And it makes a darn good deodorant soap! 

Good.Clean.Soap.Naturally.

Ingredients:  Saponified oils of certified organic olive, organic coconut, natural rice bran, sustainable palm, organic mango butter, and organic avocado.  Distilled water infused with Helichrysum flowers and certified natural Aloe Vera Gel.  Colorants:  Indigo Powder and Titanium Dioxide. Tea Tree Essential Oil.  Rosemary Oleoresin (antioxidant).

All bars measure 4 oz. in weight
pH:  neutral
Use by:  12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Honey
description:
Delicious skin loving oils combined with hemp milk for a creamy lather and all natural Rocky Mountain honey and organic cocoa!  Think graham crackers and cocoa. 


Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Saponified oils of organic non GMO soybean, organic coconut, natural olive and natural safflower.  Hemp milk.  Rocky Mountain Honey.  Organic cocoa.  Natural titanium dioxide.  

All bars measure 4 ounces in weight
pH:  neutral
Shelf life:  use by 06/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Calendula & Lavender Bar
description:
This sweet-smelling bar is even sweeter on your skin with its soothing calendula and relaxing lavender essential oils. This gentle, relaxing, and soothing bar makes a wonderful baby's bar as well, and is exceptional for those with sensitive skin.

Ingredients: Distilled Water infused with natural lavender and calendula flower petals.  Saponified all natural, non GMO oils of organic soybean, organic coconut, natural olive, and Kukui Nut Oil.  Ground natural calendula flower petals.  Lavender essential oil. 

All bars measure 3.5 ounces in weight
pH range:  neutral
Shelf life:  Use by 3/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and they should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Oatmeal Stout With Shea Butter
description:
Made with our local Breckenridge Brewery Oatmeal Stout, Shea Butter for conditioning, organic oatmeal for scrub, then fabulously scented with cherry almond fragrance oil and a dash of sparkle on top.  It’s the perfect wintertime bar by far!

Ingredients: Saponified oils of organic pomace olive, organic coconut, natural rice bran, natural Shea Butter, and organic wheat germ.  Breckenridge Brewery Oatmeal Stout infused with rose petals and distilled water.  Organic Oatmeal.  Cherry Almond Fragrance Oil. Titanium Dioxide. Sky Diamond Glitter.  Rosemary Oleoresin (antioxidant).

All bars measure 4 oz. in weight.
pH:  neutral
Use by 12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Woodland Elves
description:
Woodland Elves: This fragrance officially welcomes you to the holiday season! It’s the perfect combination of Christmas trees and Christmas spices including Siberian Fir, White Pine, Clove Buds and Mistletoe Berries. The pine and spice is tamed down by Pink Grapefruit, Frosted Lily and ripe Pineapple. 

Ingredients: Distilled water, saponified organic coconut, natural sunflower, shea butter organic olive, and castor, fragrance oil.  Swirls of merlot mica and white kaolin clay.

All bars measure 4 oz. in weight.
pH neutral
Use by:  12/30/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Manly Man Bar - Exfoilant
description:
This bar's scent is one that both men and women enjoy and Exfoliation is the scrubbing off of dead skin cells to reveal and expose "younger," fresher skin. This shedding process unclogs pores and allows your moisturizer to work more effectively.

Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Saponified, non GMO oils of organic coconut, natural olive, natural soybean, and organic Grape Seed Oil.  Natural Cornmeal (for scrub).  Essential Oils of Cedar Atlas and Lemongrass.

All bars measure 3.5 ounces in weight
pH range:  neutral
Shelf life:  use by 3/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are natural and/or organic, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Vanilla Bean
description:
A facial bar.  Organic vanilla bean and creamy yogurt make a very moisturizing bar.



Ingredients: Saponified oils of organic coconut, organic non GMO soybean, natural olive, and natural castor.  Organic vanilla bean powder, natural yogurt powder.  

All bars measure 3.5 ounces in weight

name: Rocky Mountain Eucalyptus
description:
It just smells so darn good!  Eucalyptus and rosemary it is said awakens and alerts the senses.  A good morning bar!
  

Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Saponified non GMO oils of organic soybean, organic coconut, and natural olive. Essential oils of eucalyptus and rosemary.  Swirled with natural titanium dioxide and ultramarine blue.

name: Rocky Mountain Green Tea and Brown Rice
description:
Crafted to exfoliate dryness away while moisturizing.  Roasted brown rice makes this a strong exfoliating bar.  The scent is one of our favorite unisex green tea scents.  Refreshing and spa like.

Apply this bar gently and directly to skin or use a washcloth for a less abrasive wash.  

Ingredients: Distilled Water infused with Organic Genmai Cha green tea with roasted brown rice. Saponified oils of natural pomace olive, natural palm kernel, and non GMO organic soybean.   Fragrance Oil.  

All bars measure 3.5 ounces in weight
pH range:  neutral
Shelf life:  use by 6/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Sea & Ski(n)
description:
A mix of mango, coconut and pineapple rolled into one sweet scent. Men and women both go crazy for this scent. 

Ingredients: Distilled water infused with calendula flower petals, saponified non GMO organic soy, organic coconut, natural olive natural kukui nut oil, shea butter. Fragrance Oil.  Stamped in heavy metal gold mica.



All bars measure 4 oz. in total weight
pH:  neutral

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Man
description:
A straight up clean, musk fragrance.



Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Saponified oils of natural, non GMO soybean oil, sustainable natural palm kernel, organic non GMO coconut, natural castor oil, and natural vegetable glycerin.  Musk Cybilla Fragrance Oil.  Swirled with natural colorants of French Green Clay, Activated Charcoal, and Titanium Dioxide.


All bars measure 4 ounce in weight.
pH neutral

name: Rocky Mountain Pumpkin Vine Soap
description:
Dark, creamy and rich, with notes of Cinnamon, Cardamom and Nutmeg, this is the quintessential fall fragrance. 

Made with real pumpkin.  Rich in Vitamins A & C.

Ingredients: Distilled Water. Saponified oils of organic non GMO soybean, organic coconut, natural olive and natural castor. Pumpkin puree.  Pumpkin Spice Fragrance oil.  Spirulina powder.  Heavy gold mica.  

~Good.Clean.Soap~

All bars measure 4 ounce in weight.
pH neutral

name: Rocky Mountain Clove
description:
...or Rocky Mountain Canyon...The scent of clove and jasmine abound in this mild and sudsy bar.  A unisex fragrance. 

Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Pure coconut water.   Saponified oils of organic olive, organic coconut, natural palm kernel and natural castor. Natural herbal colorant of Madder Root mixed with natural Vegetable Glycerin.  Essential oils of Clove Bud, Jasmine Absolute, and Rosemary.  

All bars measure 4 ounces in weight

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Lemon and Patchouli
description:
A unisex scented bar with Essential Oils of Patchouli and Lemon.  When lathered up in a steamy shower or bath the oil combination is known to enhance and stimulate the body and mind.  Patchouli and Lemon are said to reduce stress, calm your anxieties, uplift your mood and ease depression.  It’s a perfect way to start your day!  Truly a favorite bar!


Ingredients:  Distilled Water.  Saponified oils of non GMO organic soybean, organic coconut, sustainable palm kernel, and natural castor.  Glycerin.  Essential oil blend of patchouli, lemon, and litsea cubeba.  All natural colorants of activated charcoal, yellow dioxide and titanium dioxide. 


All bars measure 4 ounces in weight
pH neutral
Shelf life:  use by 09/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

Goat’s Milk, Rocky Mountain Honey and organic cocoa combined with skin loving oils for a creamy smooth clean.

Ingredients: Saponified oils of certified organic olive, sustainable palm, organic coconut, organic cocoa butter, and natural castor.  Distilled Water, Organic Goat's Milk, All Natural Rocky Mountain Honey, Organic Cocoa, Titanium Dioxide, Rosemary Oleoresin (antioxidant).  

All bars measure 4 oz. in weight.

name: Rocky Mountain Red
description:
A creamy face bar infused with rose petals, natural rose hips powder, and pink kaolin clay.   Makes a wonderful bath soap too.


Ingredients:  Distilled Water.  Saponified oils of non GMO organic soybean, organic coconut, natural palm kernel, and natural shea butter infused with rose petals.  Rose Hips powder.  Pink Kaolin Clay.  Essential oils of lavender, grapefruit, and geranium absolute.  Natural Titanium Dioxide for white colorant.

All bars measure 4 ounces in weight.
pH neutral

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Hollyberry with Shea Butter and Hemp Seed Oil
description:
This fragrance is a combination of holly (that fabulous green garland-making holiday shrub), pine and the tart red berries that grow on the holly shrub. It also has some supporting notes of cardamon and cinnamon to give it a bit of a twist.

Ingredients:  Distilled water, saponified oils of organic non GMO soybean, organic coconut, organic olive, shea butter, organic olive, and organic  hemp seed infused with spirulina.  Swirls of merlot mica.  Fragrance oil.

Good.Clean.Soap.

Weight:  4 oz.
pH neutral
Use by:  12/30/2014

name: Rocky Mountain Rosemary-Lavender Oat Bar
description:
This is the perfect morning bar – no coffee needed! Rosemary is said to be a stimulant to the nervous system and increases energy.  This bar offers up exceptional skin conditioning oils of Shea Butter, Coconut, and Olive.  Oat milk, hydrolyzed oats, and corn silk also condition and sooth the skin.  In the steamy bath or shower the scent will stimulate, energize and alert your senses while clearing your head and sinus cavities.  You emerge feeling clean, hydrated, and fresh; alert and centered. 

Amazing Rosemary Essential Oil is said to be a stimulant to the nervous system and increases energy. It is said, cosmetically it encourages dry, mature skin to produce more of its own natural oils and that in shampoo it is an age-old remedy for dandruff and hair loss.  It is very antiseptic, and it is said that inhaling the essential oil relieves lung congestion and sore throats.  The scent of rosemary is herbaceous, woody, sharp, and camphorous.  Warnings about rosemary: It can be overly stimulating and may increase blood pressure.  

Ingredients: Saponified, non GMO oils of organic soybean, organic coconut, and organic olive, natural castor bean, and shea butter.  Organic Oat Milk.  Essential Oils of Lavender and Rosemary.  Hydrolyzed Oats.  Corn silk. White Kaolin Clay. Powdered Clove.  Chlorophyll.  Ultramarines.  Lavender Flower.  Rosemary Oleoresin (antioxidant).


All bars measure 4 oz. in weight
pH:  neutral
Use by:  12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Peppermint and Orange
description:
A refreshing cleansing bar!

Ingredients: Distilled Water.  Saponified all natural, non GMO oils of organic soybean, natural olive, organic coconut.  Borax.  Colorants:  matte woodland green chromium oxide, activated charcoal, red iron oxide, and titanium dioxide.  Essential oils of peppermint and orange.

All bars measure 4 ounces in weight.
pH neutral
Shelf life:  Use by 10/2014

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and they should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Frankincense & Myrrh with Cocoa Butter
description:
Frankincense and Myrrh were said to be prized more than gold when Jesus was born!  Before people bathed regularly, they traded these scents to ward off body odor without the use of soap and water.  Both are considered ancient anointing oils for the body, mind and spirit.  A very alluring scent.

"And when they came into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and they fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh" (Matthew 2:11).  

Ingredients:  Saponified non GMO oils of organic olive, sustainable palm, organic coconut, organic Cocoa Butter, and natural Castor.  Distilled Water.  Blends of Essential Oil and Fragrance Oil.

All bars measure 3 oz. in weight.
pH:  neutral
Use by 12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Christmas with Cocoa Butter
description:
Anise is a sweet smelling essential oil that smells just like a mild black licorice.  You may not be a fan of black licorice, but in the steamy shower as you lather up anise and lavender it offers up a calm centering and relaxing aromatherapy.  Anise has a deep calming aroma, and the aromatherapy benefits are similar to that of Roman Chamomile.  This method can also be used to open bronchial tubes, as Anise is a bronchio-dilator.

  Cut and paste into your browser to read more: http://www.ehow.com/about_5033771_anise-oil-benefits.html#ixzz2kGsY1k9P 

Skin Loving Ingredients: Saponified oils of organic non GMO soy, sustainable palm, organic coconut, organic cocoa butter, and natural castor. Distilled Water herbal infusion of cinnamon, licorice root, orange peel, Indian sarsaparilla, chicory root, rooibos tea, star anise, and almond extract.  All natural vegetable glycerin activated charcoal, white kaolin clay, natural titanium dioxide.  Essential Oils of Anise and Lavender.  Rosemary Oleoresin.

All bars measure 3.5 oz. in weight.
pH:  neutral
Use by 12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.

name: Rocky Mountain Lemongrass & Clary Sage
description:
Essential Oils of Lemongrass combined with Clary Sage is one of the best aromatherapies because of its fresh citrus fragrance.   So turn the shower or bath on nice and steamy and lather up and breathe deeply.

Both are anti-depressants.  It is said they can boost one's self-esteem and build one's mental strength and confidence. It can even help fight depression and help relieve anxiety and panic attacks.  Both are said to relieve cramps in muscles, and also relieve coughs and headaches.  Clary Sage is said to boost one's libido and sexual desires. It works effectively in both women and men.  Calm.  Centered.  Confident.  Sexual.   Gotta’ love it!

Good.  Clean.  Soap.  Ingredients: Saponified non GMO oils of organic soybean, organic coconut, organic olive, organic hemp seed oil, and organic avocado oil.  Distilled Water infused with Certified Natural Aloe Vera Gel.  Essential oils of Lemongrass and Ginger. Detoxifying Natural Yellow Brazilian Clay.  Energizing Ginger Root powder.  Soothing scrub of Organic Helichrysum Flower.   Rosemary Oleoresin (antioxidant).

All bars measure 2 oz. in weight.
pH:  neutral
Use by 12/31/2016

Note: Even though the ingredients in this product are considered natural, please be aware that they may cause skin irritation and should be tested on a small patch of skin on the inner forearm prior to use.
